body_html:
@drpngx Not knowing enough history about the code base though I would assume the reason of having keepdims instead of keep_dims is to align with numpy? e.g.,

https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy-1.13.0/reference/generated/numpy.amin.html#numpy.amin

At the moment keras backend use keepdims while the rest of tensorflow mostly use keep_dims.
